item.title: Research Topics and Plan
item.description:
Thoughts

Liang says that the output of LLMs can be high-dimensional, as it can be a program / Turing machine, which includes functions and models. This could introduce unique security challenges.

This makes me think of two important properties of LLM:

  1. high-dimensional output
  2. input and output in the same space
    • enabling interaction/collaboration between agents. (same rank)
    • the output can be further executed by other LLMs. (diff rank)

Trending Big Topics:
